= Wget =


= Examples =

{{{bash
wget [URL]
}}}
>Generic file download


= Website download =
{{{bash
wget --mirror [URL]
}}}
>Downloads entire website (recursively searches everything)
>Notably, this may not download css files and hyperlinks will redirect to website itself

{{{bash
wget --mirror \ 
    --page-requisites \ ***REMOVED*** gets css and javascript files 
    --convert-link \ ***REMOVED*** changes hyperlinks to link to local files
    --no-clobber \ ***REMOVED*** don't duplicate
    --no-parent \ ***REMOVED*** if in subdirectory, don't go to parents
    --domains cereal.guru ***REMOVED*** if there's a subdomain or a link to google, don't download 
    https://cereal.guru
}}}
>Downloads entire website
